nodes.label: Limitation
nodes.description: The axioms of the Shapley value do not guarantee suitability for feature selection, and may sometimes imply the opposite.

nodes.label: Limitation
nodes.description: Sensitivity to formulations and parameter settings.

edges.description: Discusses how specific axioms might not align with feature selection aims.
Performance hinges on game formulation and evaluation function characteristics.
Exponential complexity impacts practicality for large-scale problems.
May average out unimportant features affecting optimal contribution.
Non-monotonic functions lead to inefficient payoff distribution.
